```{r}
plot_loss_deposits <- function(data, x_var, label, color_var,legend.position="none") {
  t <- data[abs(change_in_deposits)<0.5, .(loss_deposits = mean(change_in_deposits)), by = c("bank_size", x_var)]
  ggplot(t, aes_string(x = x_var, y = "loss_deposits*100", color = color_var)) + 
    geom_point(size=2)+
    geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ poly(x, 2), se = T)+
    theme_minimal()+
    theme(legend.position = legend.position,legend.title = element_blank())+
    labs(x=label,y="Deposit change (%)")+
    scale_color_manual(values = c("1. Less than 10b" = "dodgerblue", "2. 10 to 250b" = "firebrick", "3. More than 250b" = "forestgreen"),
                       labels = c("Less than 10b", "10 to 250b","More than 250b"))+
    scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(min(t[[x_var]]), max(t[[x_var]]), by = 1)) 
}

plot_loss_deposits(branch_df, "income_decile", "Income decile", "bank_size")
plot_loss_deposits(branch_df, "education_decile", "Education decile", "bank_size")
plot_loss_deposits(branch_df, "age_decile", "Age decile", "bank_size")
plot_loss_deposits(branch_df[!is.na(distance_decile)], "distance_decile", "Distance decile", "bank_size")
plot_loss_deposits(branch_df[!is.na(dividend_decile)], "dividend_decile", "Dividends decile", "bank_size","bottom")
plot_loss_deposits(branch_df[!is.na(refinance_decile)], "refinance_decile", "Refinance decile", "bank_size","bottom")

```

```{r}
dep_var = "I(change_in_deposits*100)"
regsample_small <- branch_df[ ASSET < 1e7  & abs(change_in_deposits)<0.5]
regsample_med <- branch_df[ASSET > 1e7 & ASSET < 25e7  & abs(change_in_deposits)<0.5]
regsample_large <- branch_df[ASSET > 25e7  & abs(change_in_deposits)<0.5]
regsample_kre <- branch_df[(RSSDID %in% kre_rssd | RSSDHCR %in% kre_rssd) & abs(change_in_deposits)<0.5]
regsample_non_kre <- branch_df[(!RSSDID %in% kre_rssd & !RSSDHCR %in% kre_rssd) & abs(change_in_deposits)<0.5]

fe1 <- "RSSDID"
fe2 <-  "STCNTYBR+RSSDID"

reg_fe <- function(x_var) {
  r <- list()

  r[[1]] <- felm(as.formula(paste0(dep_var,"~ ",x_var,"  |", fe1, "| 0 |", fe1)), data = regsample_small)
  r[[2]] <- felm(as.formula(paste0(dep_var,"~ ",x_var,"   |", fe2, "| 0 |", fe2)), data = regsample_small)
  r[[3]] <- felm(as.formula(paste0(dep_var,"~ ",x_var,"   |", fe1, "| 0 |", fe1)), data = regsample_med)
  r[[4]] <- felm(as.formula(paste0(dep_var,"~ ",x_var,"   |", fe2, "| 0 |", fe2)), data = regsample_med)
  r[[5]] <- felm(as.formula(paste0(dep_var,"~ ",x_var,"   |", fe1, "| 0 |", fe1)), data = regsample_large)
  r[[6]] <- felm(as.formula(paste0(dep_var,"~ ",x_var,"   |", fe2, "| 0 |", fe2)), data = regsample_large)
  r[[7]] <- felm(as.formula(paste0(dep_var,"~ ",x_var,"   |", fe1, "| 0 |", fe1)), data = regsample_kre)
  r[[8]] <- felm(as.formula(paste0(dep_var,"~ ",x_var,"   |", fe2, "| 0 |", fe2)), data = regsample_kre)
#   r[[9]] <- felm(as.formula(paste0(dep_var,"~ ",x_var,"   |", fe1, "| 0 |", fe1)), data = regsample_non_kre)
  # r[[10]] <- felm(as.formula(paste0(dep_var,"~ ",x_var,"   |", fe2, "| 0 |", fe2)), data = regsample_non_kre)
  
  stargazer(r,type="text",no.space = T,align = T,omit.stat=c("ser","f"),style = "qje",omit.table.layout = "n", dep.var.labels.include = FALSE)
}
```
